EmailTemplate.subject: My first Marketo email (1558981764.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Lawrence,
I am sending this email to you because I am excited to tell you about a new Marketing Automation product called Marketo.
I would encourage you to check out the following link as part of this email message:
https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Computer-Accessories/_/N-asr <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Computer-Accessories/_/N-asr]]>
Best regards, Bryce
